title: The History Of Howard Stern Act II
description:
I KEPT THE ORIGINAL AIRING DATE ON THE FILES

The History of Howard Stern is an in-depth biography following Howard from his childhood through the struggle to become #1 in radio and beyond.

With extensive audio from Howard's personal vault you'll get a rare, behind-the-scenes look at the life, career and achievements of the man who redefined broadcasting. Featuring exclusive commentary from David Letterman, Ben Stiller, Alec Baldwin, Stern's staff, his family and news reports. The series has featured 35 episodes across four "Acts". Narrated by Jim Forbes of VH1's Behind the Music, the series is produced by "The Tapes Team", a group at Sirius who put together other Stern specials such as Mammary Lane and Stern Spotlight.
------------------------------------------------------------------
